amendment.description: To require air carriers that received a refund of passenger security fees under title IV of the Emergency Wartime Supplemental Appropriations Act, 2003, to pass-through to their code-share that portion of the refund attributable to such fees collected and paid by those partners.

vote.text: Amendment SA 918 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 918 proposed by Senator Hollings for Senator Rockefeller. (consideration: CR S7812; text: CR S7812) To require air carriers that received a refund of passenger security fees under title IV of the Emergency Wartime Supplemental Appropriations Act, 2003, to pass-through to their code-share that portion of the refund attributable to such fees collected and paid by those partners.
